languages.text: "Я не могу удовлетворить ваше любопытство, не нарушив секретность сведений. Скажу лишь следующее: мы держали ситуацию под контролем. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} завязался столь плотный клубок опасных событий, что действовать в нем приходится с великими точностью и осторожностью, без права на ошибку".

"I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."
languages.original_text: "Я не могу удовлетворить ваше любопытство, не нарушив секретность сведений. Скажу лишь следующее: мы держали ситуацию под контролем. В {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g} завязался столь плотный клубок опасных событий, что действовать в нем приходится с великими точностью и осторожностью, без права на ошибку".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without violating the secrecy of the information. I will only say this: we had the situation under control. The tangle of dangerous events has tied up so tightly in the Koronus Expanse that any action must be taken with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

languages.text: 「最重要機密を公開することなく、お前の興味を満たすことはできない。状況を収拾した、としか言えぬだろうな。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}では、危険な出来事が複雑に絡み合っていいる。糸一本でも引き抜くのに細心の注意と最大の警戒を払わなくてはならず、寸分の狂いも許されない状況だ」
languages.original_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

traits.locale_text: 「最重要機密を公開することなく、お前の興味を満たすことはできない。状況を収拾した、としか言えぬだろうな。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}では、危険な出来事が複雑に絡み合っていいる。糸一本でも引き抜くのに細心の注意と最大の警戒を払わなくてはならず、寸分の狂いも許されない状況だ」

languages.original_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the Koronus Expanse — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

languages.text: “如果想要满足你的好奇心，恐怕就要泄露机密情报了。我只能告诉你，一切都在掌控之中。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的情况盘根错节、异常危险，哪怕只是捋出一根线头，都必须慎之又慎，不能有半分差池。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

traits.locale_text: “如果想要满足你的好奇心，恐怕就要泄露机密情报了。我只能告诉你，一切都在掌控之中。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的情况盘根错节、异常危险，哪怕只是捋出一根线头，都必须慎之又慎，不能有半分差池。”

languages.text: «No puedo saciar su curiosidad sin revelar información del máximo secreto. Solo diré esto: teníamos la situación plenamente controlada. Hay una maraña de situaciones peligrosas en curso en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Cortar un solo hilo es una tarea que exige la máxima precisión y cautela y no hay margen de error».
languages.original_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo saciar su curiosidad sin revelar información del máximo secreto. Solo diré esto: teníamos la situación plenamente controlada. Hay una maraña de situaciones peligrosas en curso en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Cortar un solo hilo es una tarea que exige la máxima precisión y cautela y no hay margen de error».

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas répondre à votre question sans divulguer des informations hautement confidentielles. Je ne dirai qu'une chose : la situation était parfaitement sous contrôle. Actuellement, les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} sont comparables à un sac de nœuds. Tirer sur le mauvais fil pourrait déclencher une série d'événements très regrettables, il nous faut donc faire preuve de la plus grande prudence. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas répondre à votre question sans divulguer des informations hautement confidentielles. Je ne dirai qu'une chose : la situation était parfaitement sous contrôle. Actuellement, les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} sont comparables à un sac de nœuds. Tirer sur le mauvais fil pourrait déclencher une série d'événements très regrettables, il nous faut donc faire preuve de la plus grande prudence. »

languages.text: "Ich kann Eure Neugier nicht befriedigen, ohne höchst geheime Informationen preiszugeben. Nur so viel: Wir hatten die Situation unter Kontrolle. In der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} spielt sich aktuell ein verworrener Knoten gefährlicher Ereignisse ab – das Entfernen auch nur eines Fadens muss mit höchster Präzision und Vorsicht erfolgen, denn es gibt keinen Spielraum für Fehler."
languages.original_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Eure Neugier nicht befriedigen, ohne höchst geheime Informationen preiszugeben. Nur so viel: Wir hatten die Situation unter Kontrolle. In der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} spielt sich aktuell ein verworrener Knoten gefährlicher Ereignisse ab – das Entfernen auch nur eines Fadens muss mit höchster Präzision und Vorsicht erfolgen, denn es gibt keinen Spielraum für Fehler."

languages.text: "Son derece gizli birtakım bilgileri paylaşmadan merakını gidermem mümkün değil. Yalnızca şunu söyleyeyim: Durum kontrolümüz altındaydı. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} yaşanan bazı vahim olaylar, iç içe geçmiş karmakarışık bir düğüm gibidir. İpliği bir yerinden çekmek gerekecekse bu işlem; muazzam bir özen ve dikkatle, hataya yer vermeden yapılmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "I cannot satisfy your curiosity without disclosing information of the utmost secrecy. I will say only this: we had the situation under control. There is a tangled knot of perilous events in progress in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — plucking even one thread must be performed with great precision and caution, without any room for error."

traits.locale_text: "Son derece gizli bazı bilgileri paylaşmadan merakını gidermem mümkün değil. Yalnızca şunu söyleyeyim: Durum kontrolümüz altındaydı. {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde yaşanan bazı vahim olaylar iç içe geçmiş karmakarışık bir düğüm gibi. İpliği bir yerinden çekmek gerekecekse bu işlem muazzam bir özen ve dikkatle, hataya yer vermeden yapılmalıdır."
